Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 22nd overall pick, by Colorado in 2009...
Traded from Colorado to Chicago (A) on 1/31/2011 (Going to CHA: RF J. Heyward, LF G. Parra. Going to COL: C M. Napoli, RF F. Gutierrez)...
Injured on 5/5/2011 with a Broken Foot, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Washington on 2/8/2012 (Going to CHA: 3B J. Thurston, P D. Graves. Going to WSH: LF G. Parra, P K. Heckathom)...
Had first career hit on 4/24/2013, off Wade Davis (SDN)...
Traded from Washington to Philadelphia on 5/23/2013 (Going to PHI: LF G. Parra, P J. Palermo. Going to WSH: CF A. Piatt)...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2013...
Hit first career homerun on 6/30/2014, off Hisashi Iwakuma (LAN)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Seattle on 5/27/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/30/2019, hitting .609 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from Philadelphia to Arizona on 5/22/2021 (Going to ARI: RF G. Parra. Going to PHI: P A. Summers, P W. Venne)...
Injured on 9/1/2021 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
